content:
FHIR modules such as Clinical and Medications have their own section and more importantly their own overview page. How could I get such a page for Medication Definition?
We have a category, but there is no clickable title on that page.
I also think that lots of people take a long time to realise that the module pages actually exist. It's the old UI issue where people don't tend to click the title if the sections are already showing. Equally you don't want to force them to go via an intermediate page.
Maybe the resource pages should mention the overview page at the top.
@Rik Smithies if you're going to add this, we need to make sure it's clear why you'd go to one module versus another. Maybe we need to update the Medications module as well
No problem with that Melva, that will be a significant part of the content. I am just drafting a page and trying to physically get it into the build. After that we can edit the text as we see fit.
